question: Who is responsible for my gift registry? Who should I contact if I have any questions or problems?
answer: While Mosaic Weighted Blankets Registry has a gift registry consultant available at your disposal, you are also able to update and make changes to it from your own computer or smartphone. That’s the power of having a registry in the palm of your hand. Rest assured that you are always connected to our experts. If you have any questions you can always reach the registry at 512 514 5529 or by email at info@mosaicweightedblankets.com

question: How does the gift registry work?
answer: It’s easy! You can open your gift registry free of charge through our website at http://registry.mosaicweightedblankets.com or you can utilize the help of one of our consultants. Once you create your registry, just add items and sit back to watch your gifts come in! Formal or everyday dinnerware, kitchenware, bedding, decoration, bathroom accessories, gifts, and even custom & monogram gifts- the possibilities are endless. Your consultant will help you make choices that reflect your lifestyle and your needs, no matter your budget.

question: When will I have a copy of the gift selection in my registry?
answer: You can access your registry online at http://registry.mosaicweightedblankets.com by entering the access code and password you were given when you registered. There, you will have access to detailed information on the status of your registry, which gifts were purchased, the ability to update your registry, etc. The account is always updated in real time.

question: When items are purchased or funded, is my registry automatically updated?
answer: Yes, every time a guest funds an item in your registry, be it online or in store, your registry is updated.

question: What if I change my mind?
answer: Items are exchangeable within 7 days of delivery. If you wish to exchange a gift that was given, our associates will be glad to help you out. All items must be returned in their original packaging. Exchanges and refunds are not possible for custom orders. Please email info@mosaicweightedblankets.com for an emailed link to create your return label. Your account will be credited upon receipt of your returned item.

question: How do we let our guests know that we have entrusted our gift registry to Mosaic Weighted Blankets?
answer: When you open your gift registry, you are given the option of sharing your registry to friends and family with email or social media with your custom share link.

question: How can I edit my contact details in my gift registry?
answer: You can access your account online and edit your profile. Your password and passcode will be created by you when you create your registry. You can also call a consultant at any time, and they will gladly help you with any changes.

question: Can I order over the phone?
answer: Absolutely! We understand it's sometimes easier to talk to a representative when placing an order. Call us anytime Monday-Friday from 8am to 4pm. Our number is: (512) 514-5529
